title: adidas Men's Athletic Cushioned 6-Pack Crew, Cushioned Crew Socks with Arch Compression for a Secure Fit
description: CUSHIONED COMFORT: Cushioned in the foot for comfort, these mens socks provide durability, making them suitable for all-day wear as thick socks for men. Color: Black/Aluminum 2
STAY DRY: Moisture-wicking yarns in these mens socks keep feet dry and comfortable
SECURE FIT: Arch compression in these crew socks for men offers a snug fit, helping the socks stay in place while providing support
VERSATILE DESIGN: These mens crew socks are suitable for athletic activities, casual wear, or any occasion demanding comfort, and even as stocking stuffers for adults
DURABLE PERFORMANCE: Crafted to endure wear, these mens athletic socks combine quality with comfort, a staple for men's socks & hosiery in any sock collection

Quality, comfort, and durability is what you are looking for in your everyday sock and the adidas 6-pack delivers on all of your needs. now, with the addition of arch compression, this sock delivers a secure fit and gives you the best sock to handle your day to day.
